title: Text of a Letter from the President to the Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs and the House Committee on Financial Services – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
July 22, 2019
Dear Madam Chairwoman:   (Dear Mr. Chairman:)In accordance with section 303(a)(6)(A) of the Defense Production Act of 1950, as amended (the “Act”) (50 U.S.C. 4533(a)(6)(A)), I transmit herewith notice of a shortfall in the defense industrial base relating to production capability for Light Rare Earth Elements and of action to remedy that shortfall.  The Department of Defense will take actions to develop and purchase equipment and materials needed for creating, maintaining, protecting, and expanding production capability for Light Rare Earth Elements.I have also included my determination required pursuant to section 303(a)(5) of the Act.  These proposed initiatives are essential to the national defense.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
